content: Inspired by some merit sources i tried to figure out, how to highlight the most helpful posts and users without creating a bunch of rules but in an simple and organic way.I came out with an evaluation to concentrate on those posts and users which were found to be helpful and are likely to serve as a role model. comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: This is stunning, man! You have my support. I saw your post onÂ  my other thread. The merit/post ratio helps to identify spam and merit backscratchers on the Local Board. It is now up to other Nigerians to determine whether they want it or not. We vote on everything here, so you might add a poll to your discussion. For a long time, I considered adding the Merit/post ratio to my statistics thread, but I didn't want it to get any larger than it already is.

comments.author: Jegileman
comments.body: This is a great stats you have putting together and I am very impressed by the data and information you shared about the local board. I am totally in support of this thread and I will want it to continue like this for every month so that it can encourage others in contributing quality posts to the local board. Well tried OP, you have just made everything simplified and will be a great tool (thread) to follow up in the local board every month.

comments.body: At the current state of automation, it takes me about ~1 hour so i guess weekly basis would not be realistic. Maybe i can save some time in the future with further devellopments.But to be honest it also depends on participation here. I will at least provide statistics for some months from now to get it running and then we will see if it will be accepted by the community or not.
